elements.text:
You've been texting with someone you really like and they're usually quick to respond. You notice that they saw your message a couple of hours ago and did not respond. 

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: If they like someone else and not me, I won't like it, but I'll move on from it.
They'll get back to me when they have time.
They must have a lot to do today.
They will never respond to me.
Maybe I'm annoying them, but they also might just be busy.
